validation.min: Field {name} must be at least {min} characters.
validation.min_max: Field {name} must be at least {min} characters and cannot exceed {max} characters.
validation.strict_password:
Password must use all of the following.
・ Lowercase half-width alphabet
・ Uppercase half-width alphabet
・ Half-width numbers
・ Symbols (usable symbols !"# $% & '() * +,-. / :; <=>? @ [] ^ _` {|} ~)
